name: Game Design Practices 2
description: Elaborates on the game design concepts, processes and technical practices introduced in Game Design Practices 1. Students learn how to use their understanding of game design fundamentals to craft effective digital games. Built around the detailed examination of conceptual techniques in game design and their use in DAS design practice; a comparative introduction of different frameworks for game design; and introduces the technical components of 2D and 3D game design.
